dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2334 IH: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to preempt any squatter’s rights established by State law regarding real property owned by a member of the uniformed services.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mast introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to preempt any squatter’s rights established by State law regarding real property owned by a member of the uniformed services.

section.header: Servicemembers Civil Relief Act: preemption of squatters’ rights

subsection.text: The Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (54 Stat. 1178; 50 U.S.C. 3901 et seq.) is amended by inserting, after section 301, the following new section:

section.text: Any State law establishing squatter’s rights shall not apply to premises—

paragraph.text: occupied by a squatter during a period of military service of such servicemember.

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 1(b) of such Act (50 U.S.C. 3901(b)) is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 301 the following new item:
